name: Blood Stream Commando
description:
Created during the Universities at Shady Grove Game Jam 2017 and won 2nd place. Players must fight their way to the boss at the end of the level which has four appendages that constantly spawn enemies. To win the game, players must destroy all four appendages.

Controls: W = up,  A = left, D = right, Spacebar = jump, Right Click = fire gun

Features:

Fully animated sprites

Original soundtrack

Enemies drop upgrades that heal the player and increase gun fire rate

Created by:

Andrew Hanawalt

Jesse Oresky

Andrew Asavarungsrikul

Angelo Otero

Frederick Swanh
